burlap.domain.singleagent.graphdefined

Class GraphTF

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.domain.singleagent.graphdefined.GraphTF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TerminalFunction

    public class GraphTF
extends Object
implements TerminalFunction
    A TerminalFunction for instances of GraphDefinedDomain. Lets the user specify the integer node ids of the terminal states in the graph.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Set<Integer> terminalStates
      The set of nodes ids in the graph that are terminal states

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphTF(int... nodes)
      Initializes setting all states with the provide integer node ids to be terminal states
